content: hey guys welcome to the craft for the next part of our adventure I'll project
now I don't know about some of you but I'm a huge King Kong fan and I really
want to bring that kind of theme to the island so our next craft is going to
going to show how I did that so let's go to the table and I'll show you a neat
way to bring Kong into it to start my project I'm going to use this $3 pack of
plastic animals I really like the ape in there and the rock piles so here we go
I've got it all set there's what it looks like I've washed these off with
soap and water so the glue and the paint will stick to
them nicely it means my goop to adhere this guy it's a really nice glue for
this kind of stuff and there we go he's on there now if you get a little extra
on there you can just kind of blend it out there just a toothpick I've
spray-painted them flat black and I'm gonna paint in burnt umber all around so
let's just give a nice base shade to my whole statue there we go now he's all
dry says ready to go to the next step so I'm going to use a nutmeg Brown to start
and a khaki Brown and I'll use the khaki as kind of a highlight just paint them
up there all right there he is
so he's dried up now I'm gonna paint the base I'm gonna use a sponge it's a damp
sponge I've got a gray a burnt sienna and a pebble I can use for a highlight
so I'll use the gray I'll just stipple that on there with the sponge and
that'll give a nice rock texture be careful not to get him on the ape you
don't want to have to fix that although it's not a disaster if you do you can
always fix it so fill that in looking good and I'm gonna use a little bit to
hit some areas a little brush to use to hit some areas I couldn't make I'm gonna
use the burnt sienna I'm gonna kind of put it over the base and the ape itself
to get some color variation so that's kind of nice there yeah and here he is
and I'm gonna use a metallic black is like a lacquer so let's make him look
more like an an ape and also make it look like it was a piece of wood that
got lacquered dark so I like that effect and the metallic will give it that just
paint that on the ape and he's good to go alright now I'm gonna use a pebble to
kind of stipple on the base a little bit give some color variation of the stone
and I'm also going to use a watered-down black too and the crevices of the
sculpture this looking about some shade nice shading it looks a little darker
when you first put it on like I've always said but as it when it dries
it'll give it a nice just shade color to the piece
so now I've got two green an avocado and a lighter green and I'm going to stipple
these on as like moss kind of thing and you can do this this is really easy to
do you really don't need to put any flock or anything like that on certain
pieces you can just do this and I'll just use a lighter color and just kind
of give it a little variation and it's like instant moss I also wanted to have
an offering Bowl for this guy so I've got like a little woodsy here and I get
these at the craft store I'm going to use a burnt umber on it paint it up it
gives much of my hands as they get on the bowl so fill that all in and let it
dry I'm going to use a nutmeg Brown there we go
to give the bowl some variation in color so is paint out of that all right now
for the offering to put in the bowl I wanted to use some berries like from a
plastic plant they're actually not berries but there are some kind of you
know something from the plastic plant they look like berries so I'm gonna glue
those into the bowl and that'll be the offering for the statue and we'll come
back and show you what it looks like Roderick lost in this impenetrable
jungle mmm see if I can get my bearings oh hey what's this looks like some
grapes if I let the bowl of grapes Roderick hungry
mmm hey what was that oh oh really better make a strategic retreat alright
so here we go here is the the Kong statue I think came out really neat that
bowl offering is really cool super easy to make and there's a close-up just a
plastic toy so it gives a nice crude appearance but really really comes off
so there you go see you next time hey crafters I hope you liked this vid
if you did make sure to check through my other videos cuz I literally have

I have no companion
